comment: Dr. Liz is the best professor I've ever had, and I wish I could've had her in person. She is extremely understanding, and her assignments are actually fun to do. If you want a stress-free course that you'll get something out of, this is the course for you! If you see this Dr. Liz, thank you!

Her class was by far the easiest class I have taken, she's very lenient when it comes to assignments. If you have to take English 1101, take her class. It is literally impossible to not pass her class.

Dr. Hornsey is an amazing professor! She doesn't care about attendance, and assignments don't have hard deadlines, they just have to be submitted by the end of the semester. She's also extremely funny and down to earth. If you have the opportunity to take her class, do it!

Honestly, this class was a breeze and the one I worried about the least. Everything was very straightforward and easy to complete even if you're not the best writer. The assignments were fun and not super traditional. She's also not a very hard grader at all as long as you're putting in effort. Very approachable and nice as well.
This is the best english teacher her work is fun and easy. 1-2 assignments a week that are pretty easy, doesnt take attendence shes very sweet 100% recommended.

Favorite professor by far. If you get the chance to take her, do it. There are no hard deadlines for any of the assignments, they're all due by the last day of class-ish. She's super easy on the grading, practically tells you how to do the work step by step, and makes the class fun. 10/10
Professor Hornsey is great about late work and very nice. She's super flexible about the final project and lets you do an "unessay" (I did a podcast about date labeling). Take her if you can.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Hornsey was amazing and very entertaining. there are a few papers, but they are simple and straightforward. she is very lenient, and wants all her students to succeed. 100% take her if you need brit lit.

Dr. Liz is an excellent teacher, she's accommodating and fun to learn from. The assigned reading isn't difficult and the essays are nothing to be afraid of. There's lots of material and she's easy to get in contact with. I fell in love with reading again after taking her class, and I can't thank her enough for that.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Amazing lectures

comment: My new best-professor-friend. She is the kindest and nerdiest professor I've had. There's a lot of reading, but that's to be expected, and she spaces it out well. She takes late work at no penalty and posts online copies of all the texts so that you don't have to pay for them. She is honestly amazing, I cannot speak highly enough of her.

I have never had a better professor. I can say that confidently. She gives great feedback and doesn't take off points for stupid things. She talks us THROUGH our work. Honestly, I was thinking about dropping out before her class. English was getting too hard, but she showed me how to analyze properly. 

Dr. Liz, if you ever read this, thank you.

I absolutely LOVED Mrs. Hornsey. She is engaging, her lectures are interesting, and she has a very funny and lighthearted personality. I took her for English 1101 and I would recommend to anyone definitely, definitely take her class. She was extremely lenient with deadlines and accepted late work. Favorite professor and I learned a lot!
She was great! Attendance wasn't mandatory, and basically no solid due dates until grades are due at end of semester. She is funny and very helpful. Best English teacher I've had.

Loved her class, amazing professor. The assignments were very refreshing and creative as she has a lighter teaching approach. Accepts work until the end of the semester. Has a conference before each essay to help us make sure we are going in the right direction and gives great feedback so you can get an A. Very easy to get an A.

I absolutely loved having Liz as a professor. The attendance wasn't completely mandatory but there were days where she did in-class assignments for credit. She also didn't use textbooks but we read 3 books during our semester, Carmilla, Frankenstein, The Fat Lady Sings, & saw a movie called Trainspotting. Liz is super funny, understanding & caring.
Easy A, take her if you can!!!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Hornsey was the 2nd best professor I've ever had at KSU! Understood this is a mandatory class and gives grace for turning in assignments. I took an online class and still watched the videos of the power pints she had posted because she's so funny and explains things well. Her assignments were a refreshing mix of papers and other forms of media.
I would take her again!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Super easy class. shes a very very lenient grader. accepts all late work until the last day of class. definitely take her class if you can
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Liz knows how to engage the class, while also maintaining a comfortable atmosphere. I can't think of a more comforting class that I've been in. You're given a lot of leniency, but don't slack off as it'll be hard to do a semester's work all in the last weeks. It's easy to manage though. This class improved my writing! You won't regret this class.

She is an amazing teacher and is very helpful. The only thing I would say is she does give work every class but it is just to show that you were there. You could probably still pass if you do not go to the class. She is very understanding.
I love Liz's class! She is super friendly and is easy to talk to about any questions you have during the course. She lets you turn things in late without penalty and gives great feedback on writing.

Very understanding professor that works to make her class low-stress. So helpful and she gives amazing feedback. As long as you pay attention and take note of what she expects for each assignment, you should do well.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: She is the sweetest, funniest, and most understanding professor. She made middle of the days so fun for me and she was so understanding and she's so smart! Seriously, Dr.Hornsey has such great knowledge! If you need someone for English 1101 please don't hesitate to take her class!
she is super relaxed about due date and makes everything clear on what she is looking for in your assignments.

This is the best teacher Ive ever had in my life. She is pretty young and talks to students like were all her friends, its awesome. Its also impossible to not get 100s on anything as long as you turn things in. She says all the time she makes her class very easy to pass. Small things to do every week, and last paper is the final, not a test.
Very considerate, easy to talk to and gives great fees back on homework. Chill teacher.
A great teacher! Very chill and understanding. Makes assignments very clear and interesting to follow. Connects with students and makes lectures and papers enjoyable
Shes super chill and laid back. She let us submit papers due wayyyy past the due date with no deductions or atleast she did that in the semester I had her.
Liz is one of the best teachers ever.omg she really cares about her students and works with you.She is so sweet and I wish I could have her as a professor for the rest of my college life lolll

I would say she is the best English professor, I have come across with. She is easy going and very friendly and her lectures are not long. After she explains a couple of things and goes over one PPTs she leaves you to work for the rest of the class. Even though there was a book we barely used it. Plus, she has no problem with late work
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Had her for 1102, best english proffesor I've had in a long time. Wish i had taken her for 1101!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Great teacher. She genuinely cares about her students and wants you to pass. Good at conveying info and pretty much if you participate then you pass. Shes also a caring person in general
She literally will work with you for any problems you may have. I had to miss most of the semester and she basically let me do everything online and I ended with a 100.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria

comment: I liked her and she gives 100s <333

Liz was a wonderful professor! she gave very good and constructive feedback on our papers, and her lectures were enjoyable and educational. She definitely cares about her students and will let you redo papers to get a better grade if needed. I highly recommend taking her if you have the option to.

One of the GREATEST professors!! She is one of the few professors that genuinely understands students and put in the effort for you to pass her class. Grading is lenient, her work is easy, & has real-world comparisons to understand informational material. We did have a textbook but was not used in class(used for independent reading). Def Recommend!

Liz is the most easy going teacher ive ever had, shes not a harsh grader at all and shes extremely lenient with with deadlines. Shes also so easy to talk to and genuinely cares about all of her students. I would take her class 10 times over if i could. I couldnt say enough good things. Take this class.
